recordTypes.name: Zoning Board of Review Application
recordTypes.description: Application to the Zoning Board of Review for consideration of request for Special Use, Dimensional Variance, Modification Granted by Zoning Officer, and Extension Request.

recordTypes.name: Building Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a building permit from the Town of Glocester, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Building Permit (DECKS)
recordTypes.description: Apply for a building permit from the Town of Glocester, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Building/Zoning (SHED) Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a building/shed permit from the Town of Glocester for sheds under 200 square feet - Zoning Requirement.

recordTypes.name: Building Permit (Roofing, Siding, Windows)
recordTypes.description: Apply for a building permit from the Town of Glocester, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for an electrical permit from the Town of Glocester, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: NEW Life Safety Inspection
recordTypes.description: Click here to submit your request for an inspection from the Office of the Glocester Fire Department (related to business licenses or construction rough/final)

recordTypes.name: Mechanical Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a mechanical permit from the Town of Glocester, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Plumbing Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a plumbing permit from the Town of Glocester, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Demolition Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a demolition permit from the Town of Glocester.

recordTypes.name: Sign Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a sign permit from the Town of Glocester. All permit applications should include photos of any existing signage.

recordTypes.name: Moving Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a moving permit from the Town of Glocester.

recordTypes.name: Solar Energy System and Battery Storage Unit Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a solar energy system and/or battery unit permit from the Town of Glocester.
